TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DynamicState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicate which dynamic state is taken from dynamic state commands

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState BlendConstants = int32(4)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:blendConstants state in sname:VkPipelineColorBlendStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetBlendConstants before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with sname:VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState member pname:blendEnable set to ename:VK_TRUE and any of the blend functions using a constant blend color.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState DepthBias = int32(3)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:depthBiasConstantFactor, pname:depthBiasClamp and pname:depthBiasSlopeFactor states in sname:VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetDepthBias before any draws are performed with pname:depthBiasEnable in sname:VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo set to ename:VK_TRUE.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState DepthBounds = int32(5)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:minDepthBounds and pname:maxDepthBounds states of slink:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetDepthBounds before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member pname:depthBoundsTestEnable set to ename:VK_TRUE.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState LineWidth = int32(2)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:lineWidth state in sname:VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetLineWidth before any draw commands that generate line primitives for the rasterizer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState Scissor = int32(1)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:pScissors state in sname:VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetScissor before any draw commands. The number of scissor rectangles used by a pipeline is still specified by the pname:scissorCount member of sname:VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState StencilCompareMask = int32(6)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:compareMask state in sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo for both pname:front and pname:back will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetStencilCompareMask before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member pname:stencilTestEnable set to ename:VK_TRUE

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState StencilReference = int32(8)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:reference state in sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo for both pname:front and pname:back will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetStencilReference before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member pname:stencilTestEnable set to ename:VK_TRUE

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState StencilWriteMask = int32(7)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:writeMask state in sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo for both pname:front and pname:back will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetStencilWriteMask before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with sname:VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member pname:stencilTestEnable set to ename:VK_TRUE

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Vulkan.DynamicState Viewport = int32(0)

Docs.summary: indicates that the pname:pViewports state in sname:VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must: be set dynamically with flink:vkCmdSetViewport before any draw commands. The number of viewports used by a pipeline is still specified by the pname:viewportCount member of sname:VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo.
